meanings.definition: A subatomic particle that mediates the strong force between quarks.
meanings.sent1: The gluon helps hold quarks together inside an atom.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of gluons in particle physics.
meanings.sent3: When the gluon went on strike, the quarks couldn't stick together!
meanings.sent4: The relationship between quarks and gluons is as strong as a bond between best friends.
meanings.sent5: Imagine gluons as tiny, powerful magnets pulling quarks towards each other.
